name: Alice's Burger Shop
description:
This is the planned construction site for the burger shop.
Alice was fired up.
She's going to make this store a thriving business, she said.

Prepare a variety of menus




・It is a simulation game that manages a burger shop.
・Increase the floor area of the shop, and select and place tables, chairs, and decorations
- Employ and assign employees. Employees grow and improve their proficiency through work
・Develop the menu to be provided
・Raise your reputation and aim for a popular store
・Different customers have different favorite dishes and interior decorations

Bustling shop

Arrange tables, chairs, and decorations
